example_sentence_english: I want to include all the information.

notes: past participle; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_english: It is included in the contract.

example_sentence_italian: Tu includi le note nel documento.
example_sentence_english: You include the notes in the document.
I used to include more options.
You were always including the details.

translation_english: he was including/she was including/you (formal) were including

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'incluso'

translation_english: he has included/she has included/you (formal) have included
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
example_sentence_english: He has included all the pages.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno incluso il file di dati.
example_sentence_english: They have included the data file.
